verbs.description: [V: smashing] [ARG1: pumpkins] thieving squirrels and adorable kids caught on ring cams for some reason a few boys felt the need to destroy or steal halloween decorations while some children could n't help but look adorable in their costumes houston julian gill harry potter reporter u s julian gill chron com
